```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)

```



```{r}
ggplot(iris, aes(x = Petal.Length)) +
  geom_histogram(fill = "cyan1", color = "darkcyan", bins = 15) +
  theme_test () + labs(x = "Petal Lenght", y = "Count") -> p

ggsave("practice_plot.png", p)

p

```
